Summary Note:
Venla Laura Virtanen and the RM crossed paths at a tech conference in Helsinki. They attended several keynote sessions together and realized they had a shared vision for the future of technology investments.
Venla Laura Virtanen is a 38 year old Fleet Manager from Finland. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons she decided to join.
Family Background: Venla Laura Virtanen and Viitanen tied the knot in 2012. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Venla received her secondary school diploma from Joensuu Christian College in 2005.
She then attended Arcada University of Applied Sciences, which she graduated in 2010.
Occupation History:
Venla Laura Virtanen is a 38 year old Fleet Manager from Finland.
At Langh Ship Oy, Venla Laura Virtanen held the position of Ship Broker from 2010 to 2012, developing essential skills in the field.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Shipping Company Owner at Neste Shipping Oy in 2012, further expanding her skill set.
From 2018 till now, she served as a Fleet Manager at Langh Ship Oy, solidifying her position as a leader in the industry.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 180000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
Her remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Rauma, Vantaa and Jyväskylä, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
She inherited a significant sum of 2740000 EUR from her grandfather, a respected Stock Trader, in 2017, which she has wisely invested.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome her as a new client.
